Uses of Class
eu.amidst.latentvariablemodels.staticmodels.classifiers.Classifier

  • Packages that use Classifier 
    Package Description
    eu.amidst.latentvariablemodels.staticmodels.classifiers  

    • Uses of Classifier in eu.amidst.latentvariablemodels.staticmodels.classifiers

      Subclasses of Classifier in eu.amidst.latentvariablemodels.staticmodels.classifiers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AODE
      The AODE class implements the interface Classifier and defines a (G)AODE Classifier.
      class  GaussianDiscriminantAnalysis
      Created by andresmasegosa and rcabanas on 4/3/16.
      class  HODE
      This class implements the HODE classification model (extended NB with a multinomial hidden as superparent).
      class  LatentClassificationModel
      This class implements the latent classification models.
      class  NaiveBayesClassifier
      The NaiveBayesClassifier class implements the interface Classifier and defines a Naive Bayes Classifier.
      class  TAN
      This class implements a Tree Augmente Naive Bayes classifier, TAN.
